title: Isle of Reflections
team: Chaeeun Lee, Myeongseong Kim, Hyunjung Kim
summary: An interactive lighting installation that can only be remotely explored via videotelephony.
Viewers visit the island filled with iridescent lights and colorful reflections through Zoom.

paragraph: An interactive lighting installation that can only be remotely explored via videotelephony.
Viewers visit the island filled with iridescent lights and colorful reflections through Zoom, a popular web-based video communication tool.
When the viewers see the lights and shadows that respond immediately to their voice through the screen,
they recognize that they are interacting with a distant physical space in real-time.
The viewers move between 'breakout rooms' in Zoom to explore this virtual island filled with an immersive spectrum of light and color.
Each room provides live scenes of the island from different viewing angles.
This work was accepted at SIGGRAPH 2021 ArtGallery
and won “Red Dot: Best of the Best” in Red Dot Award 2021 - Design Concept.
